seedGroups.name: Elaiosomes
seedGroups.description: Elaiosomes are “ant candy” attached to the seeds. Ants are strong and motivated, able to quickly carry the candy back to their home and tossing the heavy “candy wrapper” (seeds) into their compost piles.

species.description: Elaiosomes. Three bright white petals that fade to pink with age. Three leaves of solid green. Trillium capsules are ripe when their color fades to yellow-green/off-white & they easily pop off the stem. Sow fresh, takes 2 years to germinate.
